values: A Service of Sorrow, Self-Humbling, and Steady Hope in Our Savior and King, Jesus ChristA Service of Sorrow, Self-Humbling, and Steady Hope in Our Savior and King, Jesus Christ

The sovereignty of God over all persons and events guarantees that what Jesus Christ bought for us by his own blood will infallibly become our inheritance.The sovereignty of God over all persons and events guarantees that what Jesus Christ bought for us by his own blood will infallibly become our inheritance.
